verses.verse: And this<WH2063> is the blessing,<WH1293> with which<WH834> Moses<WH4872> the man<WH376> of God<WH430> blessed<WH1288> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> before<WH6440> his death.<WH4194>

And he said,<WH559> The LORD<WH3068> came<WH935> from Sinai,<WH5514> and rose<WH2224> up from Seir<WH8165> to them; he shined<WH3313> forth from mount<WH2022> Paran,<WH6290> and he came<WH857> with ten<WH7233> thousands<WH7233> of saints:<WH6944> from his right<WH3225> hand<WH3225> went a fiery<WH799> law<WH1881> for them.

Yes,<WH637> he loved<WH2245> the people;<WH5971> all<WH3605> his saints<WH6918> are in your hand:<WH3027> and they sat<WH8497> down<WH8497> at your feet;<WH7272> every one shall receive<WH5375> of your words.<WH1703>
Moses<WH4872> commanded<WH6680> us a law,<WH8451> even the inheritance<WH4181> of the congregation<WH6952> of Jacob.<WH3290>
And he was king<WH4428> in Jeshurun,<WH3484> when the heads<WH7218> of the people<WH5971> and the tribes<WH7626> of Israel<WH3478> were gathered<WH622> together.<WH3162>
Let Reuben<WH7205> live,<WH2421> and not die;<WH4191> and let not his men<WH4962> be few.<WH4557>

And this<WH2063> is the blessing of Judah:<WH3063> and he said,<WH559> Hear,<WH8085> LORD,<WH3068> the voice<WH6963> of Judah,<WH3063> and bring<WH935> him to his people:<WH5971> let his hands<WH3027> be sufficient<WH7227> for him; and be you an help<WH5828> to him from his enemies.<WH6862>

And of Levi<WH3878> he said,<WH559> Let your Thummim<WH8550> and your Urim<WH224> be with your holy<WH2623> one, whom<WH834> you did prove<WH5254> at<WH5921> Massah,<WH4532> and with whom you did strive<WH7378> at the waters<WH4325> of Meribah;<WH4809>

Who said<WH559> to his father<WH1> and to his mother,<WH517> I have not seen<WH7200> him; neither<WH3808> did he acknowledge<WH5234> his brothers,<WH251> nor<WH3808> knew<WH3045> his own children:<WH1121> for they have observed<WH8104> your word,<WH565> and kept<WH5341> your covenant.<WH1285>

They shall teach<WH3384> Jacob<WH3290> your judgments,<WH4941> and Israel<WH3478> your law:<WH8451> they shall put<WH7760> incense<WH7004> before<WH639> you, and whole<WH3632> burnt<WH3632> sacrifice on your altar.<WH4196>

Bless,<WH1288> LORD,<WH3068> his substance,<WH3426> and accept<WH7521> the work<WH6467> of his hands;<WH3027> smite<WH4272> through the loins<WH4975> of them that rise<WH6965> against him, and of them that hate<WH8130> him, that they rise<WH6965> not again.

And of Benjamin<WH1144> he said,<WH559> The beloved<WH3039> of the LORD<WH3068> shall dwell<WH7931> in safety<WH983> by him; and the Lord shall cover<WH2645> him all<WH3605> the day<WH3117> long, and he shall dwell<WH7931> between<WH996> his shoulders.<WH3802>

And of Joseph<WH3130> he said,<WH559> Blessed<WH1288> of the LORD<WH3068> be his land,<WH776> for the precious<WH4022> things of heaven,<WH8064> for the dew,<WH2919> and for the deep<WH8415> that coucheth<WH7257> beneath,<WH8478>
And for the precious<WH4022> fruits<WH8393> brought forth by the sun,<WH8121> and for the precious<WH4022> things put<WH1645> forth<WH1645> by the moon,<WH3391>
And for the chief<WH7218> things of the ancient<WH6924> mountains,<WH2042> and for the precious<WH4022> things of the lasting<WH5769> hills,<WH1389>

And for the precious<WH4022> things of the earth<WH776> and fullness<WH4393> thereof, and for the good<WH7522> will<WH7522> of him that dwelled<WH7931> in the bush:<WH5572> let the blessing come<WH935> on the head<WH7218> of Joseph,<WH3130> and on the top<WH6936> of the head<WH6936> of him that was separated<WH5139> from his brothers.<WH251>

His glory<WH1926> is like the firstling<WH1060> of his bullock,<WH7794> and his horns<WH7161> are like the horns<WH7161> of unicorns:<WH7214> with them he shall push<WH5055> the people<WH5971> together<WH3162> to the ends<WH657> of the earth:<WH776> and they are the ten<WH7233> thousands<WH7233> of Ephraim,<WH669> and they are the thousands<WH505> of Manasseh.<WH4519>
And of Zebulun<WH2074> he said,<WH559> Rejoice,<WH8055> Zebulun,<WH2074> in your going<WH3318> out; and, Issachar,<WH3485> in your tents.<WH168>

They shall call<WH7121> the people<WH5971> to the mountain;<WH2022> there<WH8033> they shall offer<WH2076> sacrifices<WH2077> of righteousness:<WH6664> for they shall suck<WH3243> of the abundance<WH8228> of the seas,<WH3220> and of treasures<WH8226> hid<WH2934> in the sand.<WH2344>

And of Gad<WH1410> he said,<WH559> Blessed<WH1288> be he that enlarges<WH7337> Gad:<WH1410> he dwells<WH7931> as a lion,<WH3833> and tears<WH2963> the arm<WH2220> with the crown<WH6936> of the head.<WH6936>

And he provided<WH7200> the first<WH7225> part for himself, because<WH3588> there,<WH8033> in a portion<WH2513> of the lawgiver,<WH2710> was he seated;<WH5603> and he came<WH857> with the heads<WH7218> of the people,<WH5971> he executed<WH6213> the justice<WH6666> of the LORD,<WH3068> and his judgments<WH4941> with Israel.<WH3478>
And of Dan<WH1835> he said,<WH559> Dan<WH1835> is a lion's<WH738> whelp:<WH1482> he shall leap<WH2187> from Bashan.<WH1316>

And of Naphtali<WH5321> he said,<WH559> O Naphtali,<WH5321> satisfied<WH7649> with favor,<WH7522> and full<WH4392> with the blessing<WH1293> of the LORD:<WH3068> possess<WH3423> you the west<WH3220> and the south.<WH1864>

And of Asher<WH836> he said,<WH559> Let Asher<WH836> be blessed<WH1288> with children;<WH1121> let him be acceptable<WH7522> to his brothers,<WH251> and let him dip<WH2881> his foot<WH7272> in oil.<WH8081>
Your shoes<WH4515> shall be iron<WH1270> and brass;<WH5178> and as your days,<WH3117> so shall your strength<WH1679> be.
There is none<WH369> like to the God<WH410> of Jeshurun,<WH3484> who rides<WH7392> on the heaven<WH8064> in your help,<WH5828> and in his excellency<WH1346> on the sky.<WH7834>

The eternal<WH6924> God<WH430> is your refuge,<WH4585> and underneath<WH8478> are the everlasting<WH5769> arms:<WH2220> and he shall thrust<WH1644> out the enemy<WH341> from before<WH6440> you; and shall say,<WH559> Destroy<WH8045> them.

Israel<WH3478> then shall dwell<WH7931> in safety<WH983> alone:<WH909> the fountain<WH5869> of Jacob<WH3290> shall be on a land<WH776> of corn<WH1715> and wine;<WH8492> also<WH637> his heavens<WH8064> shall drop<WH6201> down<WH6201> dew.<WH2919>

Happy<WH835> are you, O Israel:<WH3478> who<WH4310> is like<WH3644> to you, O people<WH5971> saved<WH3467> by the LORD,<WH3068> the shield<WH4043> of your help,<WH5828> and who<WH834> is the sword<WH2719> of your excellency!<WH1346> and your enemies<WH341> shall be found liars<WH3584> to you; and you shall tread<WH1869> on their high<WH1116> places.
